parameters.description: Force closing positions or orders if open

parameters.description: It must be settedf only if you want to change it. It can be changed only for acconut on Initialized or Enabled status

parameters.name: endDt
parameters.description: End date - optional, may be null

get.summary: Get global currency exchange rates
It returns the model sent via webhook for realtime notifications

exchangeRate.description: Optional - new exchange rate to use

inhibitTradeCopier.description: Where possibile, it rejects order coming from a trade copier

accountId.description: Optional - it redirects to a default account

redirectUrl.description: Optional - it is where the user is redirected after the sign of the market data agreement, otheriwse the defautl one is used

userId.description: It is the id returned on the user creation / organization link

balance.description: Starting balance of the account - Optional if setted on the trading rule, required otherwise

maximumBalance.description: Optional - override the max account balance used for drawdown calculation

header.description:
Account header. It will be used for user display on dashboards and trading platforms. May be usefull if the propfirm has account internal cumulative ID,
in order to show to the user the same ID on both sides

prefix.description: It can be used as replace of header if you want to set a prefix based on the account type with the auto generated number concated

description.description: it is a custom field that must be filled with some texts. It may be useful for have some notes relating the account. (e.g. challenge name)

accountRuleId.description: it can be null. It is the global trading rule id that must be associated to the trading account.

enabled.description: Set to true to immediately active this account. Otherwise it can be activated later through the “EnableTradingAccount” action

endDate.description: It is required if expiration mode is setted as EndDate

expirationDays.description: It is required if expiration mode is setted as Days

links.description: Dictionary with header of the link as key. Optional - it can be setted in order to show some custom links on the account dashbaord

isGiveaway.description: Flag to identify if the account is a giveaway account

quantity.description:
It works only if a contract or positionId is specified. 
It must be sent on ABS value and it should be already "normalized"

username.description: Optional - mail is used if username is keept empty and the enviornment is dedicated

passwordToSet.description: optional - if it is sent as null, a password will be generated on our side

links.description:
Custom link that can be sent in order to be visible on the user's dashboard. 
Example: redirect to subscription manage and so on

wssAllowedIP.description: Default is empty. It is used only for system user in order to protect access
